commitMessage:
@@@Making Notation subsystem independent of the kernel.

@@@Make the Notation subsystem more independent of the kernel.

@@@Issue 5500: Add DiagramSettings to diagrams.  Update APIs for Figs and Diagrams to reflect refactored functionality.

git-svn-id: http://argouml.tigris.org/svn/argouml/trunk@16142 a161b567-7d1e-0410-9ef9-912c70fedb3f

@@@Refactor NotationSettings out of DiagramSettings (and the old HashMap style parameter type).  Create new version of toString() which accepts this settings object.


git-svn-id: http://argouml.tigris.org/svn/argouml/trunk@16400 a161b567-7d1e-0410-9ef9-912c70fedb3f

@@@Removed the deprecation introduced for issue 5500. As discussed on the dev list.
No renaming of this method (yet).  since we are in alpha period.  and for stability of naming.
Clarified the reduced purpose of this method.
Replaced the use of deprecated function.

git-svn-id: http://argouml.tigris.org/svn/argouml/trunk@16647 a161b567-7d1e-0410-9ef9-912c70fedb3f

@@@Fix for issue 6129: Refactor NotationProviders to handle modelchanges.
